name: Monster Survival GO
description:
Fight monsters in real world!

Monster Survival GO is an arcade action game with AR where monsters from virtual world invaded our real world and now its your turn to grab a weapon and battle them! Explore the map and take numerous epic fights with all kinds of creatures: skeletons, orcs, trolls, giant trees and more! Enter the fight and see how quick you can be!

In Monster Survival GO game you primary target is to discover and clear all map from the monsters! Once you enter the point with the monster you’ll get into fight where you will need only one skill - your reaction! Finish the battle before the monster finishes you! The main feature of the game is that these monster are real! You can see them through your camera!

If you like games with virtual reality and if you want to see some pocket monsters on your couch then this game is definitely for you! Download it right away and enjoy it! Good luck!
